channel.title: Need help deciding for a source and Help Running ErasedPkz
channel.description:
Hey guys, i use deathlypvpz v4 source. I am trying to start again with a different source, any suggestions I can't make up my mind (This falls under the "help" topic because i need help choosing) Btw : I want a source that alot of ppl like and thats PI.
Edit - Everytime i run erasedpkz run.bat in source it spazzes out and opens and closes like 5 constantly i have to restart computer to fix it. Can anyone help with this? The code in the run.bat is [code]@echo off title Server Runner java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit[/code]

item.title: Need help deciding for a source and Help Running ErasedPkz
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

tgm clan:

Im confused to i deleted exit and it still kept doing

Jesus dude if you can’t figure this code out then you’re screwed at actually coding in Java.

Do you see the part with start Run-Server.bat
I wonder what that could possibly be doing?
maybe it’s STARTING a file with the name of “Run-Server” and the extension of .bat
I’m no genius, but I think that may be an issue if the Run-Server.bat is already running.

Also, you’d want to pause the script. Not just remove the “exit” line. .bat’s run line by line, unless code says otherwise, and if there’s no code at the last line telling it to stop, exit, pause, etc. It closes because it thinks it’s done.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help deciding for a source and Help Running ErasedPkz
